rows.label: qst710802_msg0001
rows.name:
Thanks to you, my husband Anglen
is back!

rows.label: qst710802_msg0002
rows.name:
I really wanted him to thank you
himself...

rows.label: qst710802_msg0003
rows.name:
You know, straight from the
horse's mouth, and all that...

rows.label: qst710802_msg0004
rows.name:
But he brought the fish he caught back
to me, and before I knew it he'd sloped
off again somewhere...

rows.label: qst710802_msg0005
rows.name:
Likely he's found a new fishing spot
and couldn't wait to go and try it out.

rows.label: qst710802_msg0006
rows.name:
I'll give him such an earful when
he gets back!

rows.label: qst710802_msg0008
rows.name:
And I can't do without him, so you'll
have to make do with my thanks...

rows.label: qst710801_msg0101
rows.name:
My husband said that he wanted to go
up to Coolley Lake to land a big catch
someday, so you might start up there.

rows.label: qst710801_msg0102
rows.name:
Of course, there's the very real
possibility that he's made up the
excuse just to saunter off to Gula.

rows.label: qst710801_msg0103
rows.name:
If it turns out he's just loafing around,
then give him a good hiding from me,
please!
